Articles.Content:
I seriously don't see what I'm doing wrong.

All conditions have been met, the piece that needs testing (small gear bay) is there and right clicking and "run test" doesn't seem to do anything.

Edited August 12, 2014 by jebodiah1976
I solved it myself

Wroking on for a long time (spent half the morning on this), I found it.... you have to be orbiting pretty much near the ground level.

I had to lower my periapsis to near 9Km from the ground and once reaching the periapsis I could run the tests.

It says nowhere in the contracts it has to be done this way.
Seriously, those 'test so and so in orbit' contracts usually do have an altitude specified. This could be a display bug.
NM, misread part of the problem. Ignore this post.
